beer.beer_description:
Award-winning Mad Goose is a zesty pale ale with refreshing citrus finish, inspired by our own fearsome feathered friend. Her hiss was far worse than her bite except for around mating season when it was best to stay inside for another well earnt beer.

Brewed with Maris Otter Malt, Caragold and Wheat Malt with Hallertau bittering hops and Cascade aroma hops. Light copper in colour with a great zesty hop character with citrus overtone.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 185 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 38.

items.checkin_comment: Have I got news for you time

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 400 distinct venues!

items.checkin_comment: Maltier than I thought it would be,  steady pint and hits the spot.

items.badge_description: Dispensed traditionally by hand pump, cask beers are best served at 55°F. This temperature allows all of the flavor nuances to emerge and permits appreciation of the often unfiltered texture. That's 175 checkins with the serving style of Cask! Try 5 more for Level 36!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 75 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 16.
